tasks.task: Understanding hydraulic circuit functions on a tractor
subtasks: Explain primary hydraulic circuits (first and second) on a tractor with front end loader
Describe third function (hydraulic circuit) and its applications (e.g., grapple, multi-function attachment)
Differentiate between third function and diverter kit in hydraulic systems
Discuss the concept of rear remote (diverter kit) versus third function on tractor attachments
Compare costs and benefits of factory third function vs. aftermarket diverter kit
Emphasize importance of having additional hydraulic circuits (third or diverter) for tractor versatility
Provide viewer feedback and engagement through comments and subscription
